name: outdrink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to drink more alcohol than someone else: Every weekend they go out and try to outdrink each other. Teenage boys are still outdrinking girls but the gap is reducing.
More examplesFewer examplesThey can really put the alcohol away in this town, so never try to outdrink the locals.He is a confirmed drinker and, despite being in his sixties, can outdrink people much younger than he is.We used to party hard when we were young and out-drank and out-danced everyone.
